attributes.additional_details: At 76yrs I have alwaways voted Conservative, but no more. I believe in democracy. A three line whip is not democracy, but dictatiorship. In future I will vote for whoever doesn't lie but does what is right for the country, not to keep themselves in the limelight. All three of the main political parties have made promises they have failed to keep, therefore by default, are not to be trusted. Is it anywonder the public are dissasfied
